group_1.textCenter: (There's...something that looks like chocolate,@burned onto the pot.)
(She put it on an open fire...)
(...I see, you'd have no memory@afterward of eating this...)
(I'll make mine while I clean up...)

group_1.textLeft: Oh dearie me, asking to borrow@the kitchen all of a sudden...
What brought about that change of heart?

group_1.textRight: A lot of things happened on the way!

group_1.textLeft: Since you know the story, Karin,@could you tell me about it while we wait?

group_1.textRight: Sure thing!
Um...@Let me sketch it out for you!
So that's what happened.
And then we bought some ingredients@from the store and came here.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, so you helped that little girl...@[chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]I'm sure that was a good encounter.

group_1.textRight: Sorry to keep you waiting.

group_1.textLeft: No, your timing was perfect.@Wouldn't you agree?
That's right!@We just finished catching up.

group_1.textRight: Okay.
...So, it's a little late,@but I wanted to give you my thanks.

group_1.textLeft: This is...ganache!
[chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Well! It certainly looks delicious!

group_1.textRight: I can guarantee the taste.@Give it a try.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*@Well then...

group_1.textRight: Let's dig in!
[chara:101201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It's so delicious!

group_1.textLeft: It's amazing...you'd never guess that something@so delicious was put together on the spot.

group_1.textRight: I see...@I'm glad.

group_1.textLeft: Can I have another one?

group_1.textRight: Go ahead, the chocolate here is all for you two.
You may eat as much as you like.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Oh my!@Well then, don't mind if I do!♪
Wow!@Yippee!

group_1.textRight: ...I'm sorry, but I'd better be off.
Since I've got other people@I need to give chocolate, too.

group_1.textLeft: That's right, good luck.
Thanks for all the delicious chocolate, Nagitan!

group_1.textRight: I'm the one who learned a valuable lesson.
Thank you.
...And may you have a very happy Valentine's Day.

group_1.textLeft: Whoa!
Oh my...our Kanagi...

group_1.textRight: Today's a special day, after all.
Greetings.

group_1.textLeft: Oh my, if it isn't Nagitan.
It's your day off, isn't it?@The store is already closed for the day...
Did you leave something here?

group_1.textRight: No...@Is it just the two of you?

group_1.textLeft: Two people are all you need for closing up.
So, what're you doing here?

group_1.textRight: ...Actually, I came by to give this to you.

group_1.textLeft: ...Chocolate?

group_1.textRight: That's right.
I realized that gratitude should@be expressed in tangible form.
I’m aware that it's a bit late.
I just wanted to thank the coworkers@that have taken such good care of me.

group_1.textLeft: Well well, that's nice of you.@I'm glad!
Thank you!@It looks delicious.
Oh, that's right...@Yes, this is for you.

group_1.textRight: This is...?

group_1.textLeft: Nagitan's fans dropped them off.
There are letters too, you know?

group_1.textRight: ...So many...

group_1.narration: Dear Nagitan,@You always make me feel so energized!@I'm going to keep on rooting for you no matter what.@Do your best!

group_1.textRight: ...Madam.

group_1.textLeft: What is it?

group_1.textRight: Valentine's Day is coming to an end.
But in return for all the gratitude@I've received from my masters...
I want to use my customer service to give back@just as much. No, even more than that.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*@You're growing up so fast, Nagitan.
I've got high hopes for you.

group_1.textRight: Yes!@I'll do my best to live up to your expectations.
